title: Introduction to Health and Safety Definitions

content.scenario: Welcome! You are an Empowered Pro. You don't just 'do' cosmetology; you master it. Today isn't about memorizing rules; it's about understanding the 'why' so you never have to waste time memorizing the 'what.' We are covering 9 essential habits for a clean, compliant, and successful salon.
content.connection: Mastering these terms is not just about avoiding violations; it is about building trust with your clients and creating a reputation for excellence. Every time you correctly cleanse, disinfect, or choose the right product, you are reinforcing your status as an Empowered Pro who prioritizes health and safety.
